tab1.text1:
This server is still in development, but highly functional.

Please be sure to check out 'Server Rules' and join our Discord for updates


When you're getting started, head over to our community center at 91.6 Lat 49.3 Lon. Free resources, food and shelter.


You can access the menu any time by pressing F1 on your keyboard.

tab2.text1:
Getting set up on the shop is easy!

You earn 20 gold coins for every half hour played. You also have the opportunity to earn coins from taming, killing and harvesting. Coins can be exchanged for purchases from the shop!

Access the shop by going to your inventory, and clicking the home icon on the bottom left. To close the shop, click 'off' the shop
tab2.text3:
1. Press I to access your inventory

2. Click the house icon on the bottom left of your screen

3. Select the loot crate icon on the left menu

4. Click starter kit and purchase. It's free

5. Click anywhere off the shop screen to exit

6. Your starter kit is now in your inventory.

tab3.text1:
There are currently no planned events.

These will be added when the server is out of development.

tab4.text1:
This server is a fun, safe space for all ages.

Bullying via repeated raiding, use of abusive language or any other method will result in an immediate ban.
We have a 0 tolerance of anyone making anyone else feel they are not welcome.

We're all human, we all know right from wrong. If you can't comply with basic human decency, you are not welcome here.
tab4.text2:
The community center is a safe place for all new and existing players. Any killing, raiding or any activity which puts a player at a disadvantage while in the Community Center is strictly forbidden.

If you see any behavior which violates this, report it immediately to an admin in Discord.
tab4.text3:
Raiding, intentional destruction or defacing of any admin buildings is extremely prohibited.

This includes:
- Admin Bases
- Community Centers
- Arenas
- Event Spaces

If any damage occurs by accident such as in arenas, please report this ASAP to an admin on Discord. You will not face any sanctions if the damage was accidental.

However if we see in logs that damage was caused by your tribe and it wasn't reported, we will assume this to be malicious.
